fsqa.config

Config file for FSQA basic settings. Handles BIDS data, FreeSurfer environment, etc.

Module Contents

Classes

_Config

Abstract config class

environment

Platform and environment info

execution

FreeSurfer related settings

loggers

Keep loggers easily accessible (see init()).

Functions

from_dict(settings)

Read settings from dictionary

load(filename[, skip])

Load settings from file

get([flat])

Get config as dictionary

dumps()

Format config into toml.

to_filename(filename)

Write settings to file.

class fsqa.config.execution[source]

Bases: _Config

FreeSurfer related settings

bids_dir

Existing path to BIDS-formatted data

freesurfer_home

FreeSurfer Home directory

fs_license

FreeSurfer license file

keep = False

Keep intermediate files or not

layout

A BIDSLayout object, see init().

log_dir

Log directory

num_imgs = 10

Number of mosaic images to generate. Default 10.

output_dir

Folder where reports will be stored

output_layout = bids

Layout of derivatives within output_dir

participant_label

List of participant ids to be processed

run_uuid

Run identifier

subjects_dir

FreeSurfer’s subjects directory

work_dir

Path to working directory for intermediate files

_layout
_paths = ['bids_dir', 'fs_subjects_dir', 'layout', 'output_dir', 'work_dir']
